reviews.review_msg: Super nice and passionate about her field.

Mary Ellen was a fantastic professor who really opens the door up for people to challenge how they view North American history. She is a very justifiable marker and will provide as much guidance as you need, especially due to the fact that some Indigenous history is not covered or easily accessible. I would take another class with her.
I found her to be an expert on her subject and a good lecturer. Student questions and participation are encouraged, and workload is fair.
